title: Reasons To Worry About U.S.–China Trade Tension
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: The U.S. administration’s increasingly tough stance on China suggests the U.S.-China dispute is rising to almost Cold War levels. De-escalation will be neither quick nor easy. Whether this was the intention or not, the hard line against Beijing gives the U.S. instant credibility to carry out tough measures on trade. That makes U.S.-China trade an issue that could prompt an immediate market reaction. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:summary:
The U.S. administration’s increasingly tough stance on China suggests the U.S.-China dispute is rising to almost Cold War levels. De-escalation will be neither quick nor easy. Whether this was the intention or not, the hard line against Beijing gives the U.S. instant credibility to carry out tough measures on trade. That makes U.S.-China trade an issue that could prompt an immediate market reaction.
